content.raw: No, I don't think we discussed this in the proposal. My reasoning is that the default resolveTo behaves similar to the default relative_to. For elements that existed in sdformat 1.6, the default relative_to is the parent xml element except for joint. For Frames in 1.7, we have a more nuanced default relative_to and I thought the default resolveTo should mirror that.
content.html: No, I don't think we discussed this in the proposal. My reasoning is that the default resolveTo behaves similar to the default relative_to. For elements that existed in sdformat 1.6, the default relative_to is the parent xml element except for joint. For Frames in 1.7, we have a more nuanced default relative_to and I thought the default resolveTo should mirror that.
